item.title: Javascript Timeline
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: It seems that having Facebook offer a timeline UI has reignited interest in that format. I’ve seen several Javascript libraries pop up that make generating a timeline UI fairly simple. One that caught my eye is Timeline. Has anyone whipped up scripts to automatically populate data for Timeline from Subversion or Git repos?
item.content:encoded:
It seems that having Facebook offer a timeline UI has reignited interest in that format. I’ve seen several Javascript libraries pop up that make generating a timeline UI fairly simple. One that caught my eye is Timeline.

Has anyone whipped up scripts to automatically populate data for Timeline from Subversion or Git repos?
